name: 7 Deeds
summary:
你要扮演一个10岁的男孩Stan，独自待在满是怪兽的家里，想办法存活7天。
每天都要存活到晚上9:30，要注意使用厕所和吃饭。

The game takes place in the house of Stan, a ten year old boy. Your job is to keep him safe from the horror the house holds. Survive 4 Nights to finish the story and unlock Hardcore Night. Each night last until 9.30 AM because monster have jobs too and they can't play all day.
